owl2prefuse.graph
Class OWLGraphConverter

java.lang.Object
  owl2prefuse.Converter
      owl2prefuse.graph.OWLGraphConverter

public class OWLGraphConverter
extends Converter

This class converts the given OWL Model to a Prefuse graph datastructure.
